mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movie (movieName, director, actor, runTime, openDate, movieAge, cateNum, screenType, thumb1, thumb2, thumb3, story) VALUES (#{movieName}, #{director}, #{actor}, #{runTime}, #{openDate}, #{movieAge}, #{cateNum}, #{screenType}, #{thumb1}, #{thumb2}, #{thumb3}, #{story})
INSERT INTO cinemaFile (movieNum, newName, oriName, rdate) VALUES (#{movieNum}, #{newName}, #{oriName}, #{rdate})
